media.headline: Sale welcomed to Fenway
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Sale gets warm welcome at Fenway Park
media.bigblurb: Chris Sale receives a standing ovation as he is introduced in his first game with the Red Sox at Fenway Park

media.headline: Porcello's first pitch
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Porcello fires a strike for first pitch
media.bigblurb: Reigning AL Cy Young Award winner Rick Porcello throws the opening pitch of the game, a strike that is fouled off by Adam Frazier

media.headline: Cole's first strikeout
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Cole fans Benintendi for first strikeout
media.bigblurb: Gerrit Cole gets Andrew Benintendi swinging for his first strikeout on Opening Day

media.headline: Pirates starters introduced
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Pirates starters introduced on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: Clint Hurdle and the Pirates' starting lineup are introduced on Opening Day at Fenway Park

media.headline: Red Sox starters introduced
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Opening Day lineup for the Red Sox
media.bigblurb: John Farrell and the Red Sox's starting lineup are introduced to the crowd at Fenway Park on Opening Day

media.headline: Porcello's first strikeout
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Porcello fans Harrison to escape jam
media.bigblurb: Rick Porcello whiffs Josh Harrison for his first strikeout on Opening Day, stranding two runners on base in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Tom Brady tosses out first pitch
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Tom Brady tosses out ceremonial first pitch
media.bigblurb: Patriots quarterback Tom Brady throws out the ceremonial first pitch on Opening Day at Fenway Park

media.headline: Gronk steals Brady's jersey
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Brady's jersey returned, Gronk steals it
media.bigblurb: Tom Brady's stolen jersey is returned to him only to have it stolen again by teammate Rob Gronkowski

media.headline: Bradley's running catch
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Bradley makes great running catch in center
media.bigblurb: Jackie Bradley Jr. makes a great running catch on the warning track in center field to rob Francisco Cervelli of extra bases

media.headline: Harrison handles tricky hop
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Harrison recovers to get out at first
media.bigblurb: Josh Harrison handles a tricky hop off the mound and recovers in time to throw out Dustin Pedroia at first base

media.headline: Children's chorus sings anthem
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Boston Children's Chorus sings anthem
media.bigblurb: The Boston Children's Chorus sings the national anthem before the Red Sox host the Pirates on Opening Day

media.headline: Sandoval's RBI single
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Sandoval hustles out RBI infield single
media.bigblurb: Pablo Sandoval beats the throw to first on a slow ground ball to short to score Jackie Bradley Jr., giving the Red Sox a 1-0 lead

media.headline: Benintendi's three-run shot
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Benintendi crushes three-run home run
media.bigblurb: Andrew Benintendi launches a three-run home run to right field, extending the Red Sox's lead to 5-0 in the 5th inning

media.headline: Pedroia's RBI single to center
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Pedroia lines RBI single back up the middle
media.bigblurb: Dustin Pedroia rips an RBI single back up the middle to score Pablo Sandoval in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Harrison's RBI single
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Harrison lines RBI single to left field
media.bigblurb: Josh Harrison ropes an RBI single to left field to get the Pirates on the board in the top of the 7th inning

media.headline: Mercer's RBI single
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Mercer lines RBI single to center
media.bigblurb: Jordy Mercer laces an RBI single to center field, cutting the Pirates' deficit to 5-2 in the top of the 7th inning

media.headline: Marte's sac fly to left
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Marte lifts sacrifice fly to left field
media.bigblurb: Starling Marte lifts a sacrifice fly to left field to score Josh Harrison in the top of the 7th inning

media.headline: Benintendi's running catch
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Benintendi makes running catch in left
media.bigblurb: Andrew Benintendi stretches to make a running catch in left field to rob Starling Marte of extra bases in the top of the 7th inning

media.headline: Statcast: Bradley Jr.'s catch
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Statcast tracks Bradley Jr.'s running catch
media.bigblurb: Statcast tracks the opportunity time and distance needed for Jackie Bradley Jr.'s catch on a hard-hit ball by Francisco Cervelli

media.headline: Kimbrel locks down the save
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Kimbrel induces pop up to earn save
media.bigblurb: Craig Kimbrel induces a pop up from Starling Marte to earn the save, sealing the win for the Red Sox on Opening Day

media.headline: Frazier's catch near the stands
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Frazier makes catch in foul territory
media.bigblurb: Adam Frazier makes a nice catch near the stands in left field on a pop fly off the bat of Andrew Benintendi

media.headline: Harrison starts double play
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Harrison starts 4-6-3 double play
media.bigblurb: Josh Harrison flips the ball to second base to start a 4-6-3 double play to end the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Leon nabs Polanco at second
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Leon throws out Polanco at second
media.bigblurb: Sandy Leon fires to second to nab Gregory Polanco attempting to steal in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Bradley Jr.'s triple to right
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Bradley Jr. hammers triple to deep right
media.bigblurb: Jackie Bradley Jr. laces a triple off the wall in right field in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Leon's bunt single against shift
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Leon reaches on bunt single to third
media.bigblurb: Sandy Leon reaches on a bunt single down the third-base line against the shift to extend the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Hurdle on Cole's outing in loss
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Hurdle discusses Cole's rough Opening Day
media.bigblurb: Pirates manager Clint Hurdle talks about Gerrit Cole's struggles in the 5th inning as the Pirates fall to the Red Sox on Opening Day

media.headline: Porcello K's five on Opening Day
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Porcello fans five, allows three runs
media.bigblurb: Reigning AL Cy Young Award winner Rick Porcello goes 6 1/3 innings, allowing three runs and striking out five on Opening Day

media.headline: Farrell on Porcello's outing
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Farrell on Porcello's performance in 5-3 win
media.bigblurb: Red Sox manager John Farrell discusses Rick Porcello's outing and Andrew Benintendi's three-run homer in the team's win over the Pirates

media.headline: Red Sox score five in the 5th
media.blurb: PIT@BOS: Red Sox score five runs in the 5th inning
media.bigblurb: The Red Sox score five runs in the bottom of the 5th inning, highlighted by a three-run home run by Andrew Benintendi

media.headline: Recap: PIT 3, BOS 5
media.blurb: 4/3/17: Benintendi lifts Red Sox to Opening Day win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Andrew Benintendi crushed a three-run home run and Rick Porcello went 6 1/3 innings to lead the Red Sox to a win on Opening Day

media.headline: 4/3/17 CG: PIT@BOS
media.blurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: PIT@BOS
media.bigblurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: PIT@BOS
